get.description: This operation returns a list of your Text Base collections.

post.description: This operation creates a new collection in your Text Base.

get.description: This operation returns a single collection in your Text Base by its unique ID.

post.description: This operation updates the metadata of a specific collection.

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of records from a specific collection.

post.description: Create a new record in a collection.

get.description: Retrieve a specific record from a collection.

post.description: Modify the metadata of a specific record within a collection.

delete.description: Delete a specific record from a collection.

post.description: Execute a search query across specified collections within your TaskingAI environment to retrieve relevant chunks of information.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all assistants available in your project.

post.description: Create an assistant with a model and instructions.

get.description: Retrieve a single assistant by its unique ID.

post.description: Update the properties of an existing assistant.

delete.description: Remove an existing assistant from your project.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all chats available in your project.

post.description: Create a new chat within your project.

get.description: Retrieve the details of a specific chat by its unique ID.

post.description: Update the properties of a specific chat.

delete.description: Remove an existing chat from your project.

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of messages from a specific chat.

post.description: Send a new message within a specific chat.

get.description: Retrieve a specific message from a chat.

post.description: Modify the metadata of a specific message within a chat.
Generate a new message with the role of 'assistant'.

object.title: Object
object.description: The object type, which is always `Assistant`.

model_id.title: Model Id
model_id.description: The ID of an available chat completion model in your project.

system_prompt_template.title: System Prompt Template
system_prompt_template.description: A list of system prompt chunks where prompt variables are wrapped by curly brackets, e.g. `{{variable}}`.

metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: The assistant metadata. It can store up to 16 key-value pairs where each key's length is less than 64 and value's length is less than 512.

created_timestamp.title: Created Timestamp
created_timestamp.description: The timestamp when the assistant was created.

model_id.title: Model Id
model_id.description: The ID of an available chat completion model in your project.

system_prompt_template.title: System Prompt Template
system_prompt_template.description: A list of system prompt chunks where prompt variables are wrapped by curly brackets, e.g. `{{variable}}`.

metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: The assistant metadata. It can store up to 16 key-value pairs where each key's length is less than 64 and value's length is less than 512.

has_more.title: Has More
has_more.description: Whether there are more assistants to return.

fetched_count.title: Fetched Count
fetched_count.description: The number of assistants returned in the response.

total_count.title: Total Count
total_count.description: The total number of assistants in the project.

type.title: Type
type.description: The retrieval source type. Currently only `collection` is supported.

type.title: Type
type.description: The tool type, which can be `function` or `action`.

model_id.title: Model Id
model_id.description: The ID of an available chat completion model in your project.

system_prompt_template.title: System Prompt Template
system_prompt_template.description: A list of system prompt chunks where prompt variables are wrapped by curly brackets, e.g. `{{variable}}`.

metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: The assistant metadata. It can store up to 16 key-value pairs where each key's length is less than 64 and value's length is less than 512.

object.title: Object
object.description: The object type, which is always `Chat`.

metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: The chat metadata. It can store up to 16 key-value pairs where each key's length is less than 64 and value's length is less than 512.

created_timestamp.title: Created Timestamp
created_timestamp.description: The timestamp when the chat was created.

role.description: The role of the message, which is always 'assistant' for an assistant message

function_call.description: The funcion call requested by the assistant.

parameters.title: Parameters
parameters.description: The function's parameters are represented as an object in JSON Schema format.

role.description: The role of the message, which is always 'function' for a function message

stream.title: Stream
stream.description: Indicates whether the response should be streamed. If set to True, the response will be streamed using Server-Sent Events (SSE).

messages.title: Messages
messages.description: The messages to be sent to the model.

function_call.title: Function Call
function_call.description: Controls whether a specific function is invoked by the model. If set to 'none', the model will generate a message without calling a function. If set to 'auto', the model can choose between generating a message or calling a function. Defining a specific function using {'name': 'my_function'} instructs the model to call that particular function. By default, 'none' is selected when there are no functions available, and 'auto' is selected when one or more functions are present.

role.description: The role of the message, which is always 'system' for a system message
The role of the message, which is always 'user' for a user message

metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: The chat metadata. It can store up to 16 key-value pairs where each key's length is less than 64 and value's length is less than 512.

has_more.title: Has More
has_more.description: Whether there are more chats to fetch.

fetched_count.title: Fetched Count
fetched_count.description: The number of chats returned in the response.

metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: The chat metadata. It can store up to 16 key-value pairs where each key's length is less than 64 and value's length is less than 512.

object.title: Object
object.description: The object type, which is always `Chunk`.

record_id.title: Record Id
record_id.description: The record ID of the chunk

collection_id.title: Collection Id
collection_id.description: The collection ID of the chunk

score.title: Score
score.description: The chunk score indicating the relevance to the params text.

top_k.title: Top K
top_k.description: The number of most relevant chunks to return.

query_text.title: Query Text
query_text.description: The query text. Retrieval service will find and return the most relevant chunks to this text.

fetched_count.title: Fetched Count
fetched_count.description: The number of chunks returned in the response.

object.title: Object
object.description: The object type, which is always `Collection`.

capacity.title: Capacity
capacity.description: The collection capacity. Currently only 1000 is supported and we'll provide more options in the future.

num_records.title: Num Records
num_records.description: The number of records in the collection.

num_chunks.title: Num Chunks
num_chunks.description: The number of chunks in the collection.

embedding_model_id.title: Embedding Model Id
embedding_model_id.description: The ID of an available text embedding model in your project.

metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: The collection metadata. It can store up to 16 key-value pairs where each key's length is less than 64 and value's length is less than 512.

created_timestamp.title: Created Timestamp
created_timestamp.description: The timestamp when the collection was created.

status.title: Status
status.description: The collection status. It can be `creating`, `ready`, `deleting` or `error`.

chunk_size.title: Chunk Size
chunk_size.description: Chunk size determines the max size of the text chunks in the collection. It is counted by number of chunk text tokens.

chunk_overlap.title: Chunk Overlap
chunk_overlap.description: Chunk overlap specifies how much overlap there should be between chunks, counted by number of chunk text tokens. It cannot be larger than `chunk_size`.

metric.title: Metric
metric.description: The text chunks are embedded into a vector space_schema and the similarity between two chunks is measured by the cosine distance between their vectors. Currently only `cosine` is supported and we'll provide more options in the future.

chunk_size.title: Chunk Size
chunk_size.description: Chunk size determines the max size of the text chunks in the collection. It is counted by number of chunk text tokens.

chunk_overlap.title: Chunk Overlap
chunk_overlap.description: Chunk overlap specifies how much overlap there should be between chunks, counted by number of chunk text tokens. It cannot be larger than `chunk_size`.

metric.title: Metric
metric.description: The text chunks are embedded into a vector space_schema and the similarity between two chunks is measured by the cosine distance between their vectors. Currently only `cosine` is supported and we'll provide more options in the future.

capacity.title: Capacity
capacity.description: The collection capacity. Currently only 1000 is supported and we'll provide more options in the future.

embedding_model_id.title: Embedding Model Id
embedding_model_id.description: The ID of an available text embedding model in your project.

configs.description: The collection configs indicating how the collection stores and indexes the text chunks. It cannot change after creation.

metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: The collection metadata. It can store up to 16 key-value pairs where each key's length is less than 64 and value's length is less than 512.

fetched_count.title: Fetched Count
fetched_count.description: The number of collections returned in the response.

total_count.title: Total Count
total_count.description: The total number of collections in the project.

has_more.title: Has More
has_more.description: Whether there are more collections to fetch.

metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: The collection metadata. It can store up to 16 key-value pairs where each key's length is less than 64 and value's length is less than 512.

object.title: Object
object.description: The object type, which is always `Message`.

assistant_id.title: Assistant Id
assistant_id.description: The assistant ID if the message is generated by an assistant.

role.title: Role
role.description: The role of the message. It can be `user` or `assistant`.

created_timestamp.title: Created Timestamp
created_timestamp.description: The timestamp when the message was created.

text.title: Text
text.description: The text content of the message.

role.description: The role of the message. Currently only `user` is supported.

metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: The message metadata. It can store up to 16 key-value pairs where each key's length is less than 64 and value's length is less than 512.

options.description: The options for generating assistant response messages. If any options are turned on, the response data will be returned in SSE format.

system_prompt_variables.title: System Prompt Variables
system_prompt_variables.description: The variables that fit the system prompt template.

stream.title: Stream
stream.description: Whether to return the assistant message in stream format.

tool_log.title: Tool Log
tool_log.description: Whether to include the tool call information and result in the response.

retrieval_log.title: Retrieval Log
retrieval_log.description: Whether to include the retrieval call in the response.

has_more.title: Has More
has_more.description: Whether there are more messages to fetch.

fetched_count.title: Fetched Count
fetched_count.description: The number of messages returned in the response.

metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: The message metadata. It can store up to 16 key-value pairs where each key's length is less than 64 and value's length is less than 512.

object.title: Object
object.description: The object type, which is always `Record`.

type.title: Type
type.description: The record type, which is always `text` or `file`.

num_chunks.title: Num Chunks
num_chunks.description: The number of chunks in the record.

metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: The record metadata. It can store up to 16 key-value pairs where each key's length is less than 64 and value's length is less than 512.

created_timestamp.title: Created Timestamp
created_timestamp.description: The timestamp when the record was created.

status.title: Status
status.description: The record status, which can be `creating`, `ready`, `deleting`, `error` or `partial`.

fetched_count.title: Fetched Count
fetched_count.description: The number of records returned in the response.

total_count.title: Total Count
total_count.description: The total number of records in the collection.

has_more.title: Has More
has_more.description: Whether there are more records to return.

index.title: Index
index.description: The index of the embedding output.

input.title: Input
input.description: The input text or a list of input texts.

status.title: Status
status.description: The status of the response, which is always 'success'.
